mapinfo.details: Amazonia: fight along the mighty Amazon River.
mapinfo.loadDetails: Teams are separated by the mighty Amazon River. Trade Routes and Natives may be separated... or maybe not. TupinambÃ¡ or Societas Iesu live in the rain forests. Build a navy to control the river, and control the map -- but keep an eye out for enemy Outposts and cannon on the shores.
